channel.title: Need help with a make donator command

item.title: Need help with a make donator command
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

Thanks Chassy, I got a tiny error, but it was a typo.

    if (command.equals[b]Ignor[/b]Case("donated") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            donator = 1;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a make donator command

item.title: Need help with a make donator command
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Then just add anothe ending bracket;

[code] if (command.equalsIgnorCase(“donated”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            donator = 1;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a make donator command

item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnorCase(“donated”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            donator = 1;
            c.disconnected = true;
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

Please correct my errors. I put that in my Client Class and I get 100 errors. Any help is GREATLY appreciated.
